description: This file defines the interface for Zigbee I/O operations, including context initialization, destruction, and methods for reading and writing various data types. It provides function declarations and macros for marshalling Zigbee payloads, primarily for use in embedded or IoT device communication.

methods.name: zigbeeIOInit
methods.description: Initializes a Zigbee I/O context for payload marshalling with specified buffer and mode.

methods.name: zigbeeIODestroy
methods.description: Destroys a Zigbee I/O context, freeing resources.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetUint8
methods.description: Reads an unsigned 8-bit integer from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutUint8
methods.description: Writes an unsigned 8-bit integer to the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetInt8
methods.description: Reads a signed 8-bit integer from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutInt8
methods.description: Writes a signed 8-bit integer to the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetString
methods.description: Reads a short Zigbee string (length <= UINT8_MAX) from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetBytes
methods.description: Reads raw bytes from the context into a provided buffer.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutString
methods.description: Writes a short Zigbee string to the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutBytes
methods.description: Writes raw bytes from a buffer into the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetUint16
methods.description: Reads a 16-bit unsigned integer from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutUint16
methods.description: Writes a 16-bit unsigned integer to the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetInt16
methods.description: Reads a 16-bit signed integer from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutInt16
methods.description: Writes a 16-bit signed integer to the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetUint32
methods.description: Reads a 32-bit unsigned integer from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutUint32
methods.description: Writes a 32-bit unsigned integer to the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOGetInt32
methods.description: Reads a 32-bit signed integer from the context.

methods.name: zigbeeIOPutInt32
methods.description: Writes a 32-bit signed integer to the context.
